item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, December 15, 2024 at 8:15 PM UTC
item.description:

2. SVC16: Simplest Virtual Computer (113 points | 28 comments)
3. Show HN: SmartHome – An Adventure Game (93 points | 18 comments)

9. Why Dumb TVs Deserve a Comeback (28 points | 30 comments)

12. Isomorphic Web Components (36 points | 17 comments)
13. Trellis (YC W24) Is Hiring Eng to Automate PDFs Task at Scale ( | hide)

25. Tenstorrent and the State of AI Hardware Startups (201 points | 91 comments)
26. When a Crystal Ball Isn't Enough to Make You Rich (210 points | 118 comments)
